Package entity

Class Farmer

java.lang.Object
entity.Entity
entity.Farmer
public class Farmer extends Entity
An entity called Farmer which is the main enemy of the game. These are stored in an array in the map Has a different image for each direction it moves in Constantly tries to path towards the player character. If successful, player loses a life and is reset to spawn location
Author:
Andrew Hein (ach17)

    • Farmer

      public Farmer(GamePanel gp)

      Parameters:
      gp -

  • Method Details

    • update

      public void update()
      Main "brain" of the farmer. Controls what it does and how it acts Finds most efficient path to the player by calling setAction() and then checks various collision factors If there are no collisions, the farmer can move on this path towards the player If there are collisions, farmer does not move

    • interactPlayer

      public void interactPlayer(int hitDistance)
      Check distance between player & farmer and make interaction if it's under the given value

    • draw

      public void draw(Graphics2D graphic2)
      Finds out where the farmer should be on the screen (if anywhere) Also sets the image of the farmer based on the direction it is going If the farmer should be on the players screen, this function draws them
      Parameters:
      graphic2 - main graphic used to draw everything to the screen

    • respawnFarmers

      public static void respawnFarmers(Farmer[] farmers)
      Resets all of the farmers to their starting locations and turns collision off Called when player and farmers collide and everything needs to be reset
      Parameters:
      farmers - array of farmers stored in map
